name: aurielle-cosmetics
description: Premium bilingual cosmetics brand landing page (static) with Node build scripts for product pages and QR codes.

scripts.build: node scripts/generate-qr.js && node scripts/build.js && npx tailwindcss -i src/styles.css -o dist/assets/styles.css --minify && node scripts/copy-static.js
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx live-server dist --port=8080 --open=/index.html
scripts.watch: node scripts/generate-qr.js && node scripts/build.js && npx tailwindcss -i src/styles.css -o dist/assets/styles.css --watch
scripts.build:prod: node scripts/generate-qr.js && node scripts/build.js && npx tailwindcss -i src/styles.css -o dist/assets/styles.css --minify && node scripts/copy-static.js
scripts.deploy:gh: npm run build:prod && npx gh-pages -d dist
